from notebookutils import mssparkutils
### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/zendesk_folder") 
mssparkutils.fs.mount( 
'abfss://odw-raw@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/JsonTest/', 
"/zendesk_folder", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"}

from pprint import pprint as pp

with open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/zendesk_folder/output_0.json", 'r') as zendesk_raw:

        import json
        
        zendesk_dict = json.load(zendesk_raw)
pp(dict( flattenDict(zendesk_dict, join=lambda a,b:a+'_'+b, lift=lambda x:x) ))
